Submodules¶

simplecv.mmdet_v1.py_analyze_model module¶

Base on test_net.py/results, via simplecv.mmdet_v1.ext_utils.translate.trans_test_results(). options:

  • simplecv/utils/search_thr.py: find_score_thr() / score_thr, optional PR curve

  • simplecv/utils/analyze.py: matrix_analysis_object() / by object

  • simplecv/utils/analyze.py: matrix_analysis_image() / by image

  • simplecv/utils/analyze.py: display_hardmini() / FP + FN

  • simplecv/utils/analyze.py: display_dataset() / show bbox

simplecv.mmdet_v1.py_auto_label module¶

Base on test_net.py/results, via simplecv.mmdet_v1.ext_utils.translate.trans_test_results(). options:

  • xml: simplecv/utils/results2labelImg.py

  • json: simplecv/utils/results2labelme.py
